title: Designing Resilient Systems with Apache Cassandraâ„¢
description:
[Live Stream from Queen City Bytes Meetup]
In this talk, Aleks Volochnev (Professional Cloud Architect and Developer Advocate at DataStax) analyzes step-by-step Apache Cassandra - a distributed NoSQL database that helps businesses like Apple or Netflix handle petabytes of data while being available "always-on". What are the secrets behind this, and how could we use distributed system principles to improve our applications? Join us to create better, reliable, and scalable applications!
